head.title: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: Multiple where clauses

meta.name: title
meta.content: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: Multiple where clauses

body.p: With XQuery 3.0 enabled, a FLWOR expression may contain multiple where clauses. For example for $c in customer where $c/credit > 0 where $c/region = 'EMEA' The effect is exactly as if the clauses had been separated with the "and" operator.
